pkgmetadata.longdescription: # together-worker## Example```consolecat examples/echo.py``````pythonfrom together_worker.fast_inference import FastInferenceInterfaceclass Echo(FastInferenceInterface): def setup(self, args): self.message = " to you too." def dispatch_request(self, args, env): prompt = args[0]["prompt"] return { "choices": [ { "text": prompt + self.message } ], }```### Test with local REST server```consolepip install --upgrade together-workerpython -m together_worker.serving examples.echo Echo``````consolecurl -X POST http://127.0.0.1:5001/ -d '{ "prompt": "test123" }'{"choices": [{"text": "test123 to you too."}]}```## Setup dev```consolemake install```## Publish to PyPiGitHub repo > Releases > Draft a new Release > Choose a tag > Create new tag on publish >Name the tag using the current version from pyproject.toml with a "v" e.g. `v1.0.9`.> Publish ReleaseIn the repo toolbar select > Actions- Verify the publish workflow is running and completes successfully
